short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to make you laugh anytime of the day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click on the add on returns a hilarious joke. For more jokes you can use the refresh button. If you want to submit a request for a feature or if you want to improve it. I am open to suggestions. My info is in the second page of the add on.
